Description: Arthur Andersen LLP agreed to pay $7 million in connection with Andersen's audits of the annual financial statements of Waste Management Inc. for the years 1992 through 1996.  Those financial statements, on which Andersen issued unqualified or clean opinions, overstated Waste Management's pre-tax income by more than $1 billion.
Andersen, LLP agreed to pay $217 million in settlement of allegations it failed to warn investors about the Baptist Foundation of Arizona's financial difficulties.
